channel.title: Hax0rscape v1
channel.description:
[b]FEATURES OF HAXORSCAPE V1:[/b] Update 1: Fixing Player Messaging Glitches - Actual player messaging wasnt even 10% working, brought it to perfect messaging. - Friends and Ignore lists work. - Doesnt display a world since theres only one.
Update 2: Improved Ranging Skill - Perfect arrow animations and projectiles working with an almost perfect delay. - Everytime an arrow is shot; an arrow is removed from the player. - If arrows arent equipped, player doesnt shoot. - Faces player/npc when shooting. - Almost all bows work except for 3 longbows.
Update 3: Magic Bow Special - Perfect arrow projectiles, perfect animation, great delay. - Shows two arrows being shot. - Double hitting.
Update 4: Crystal Bow - Perfect animations, gfx and projectiles. - Doesnt use arrows.
Update 5: Fixed Repeative Animations - No more animation looping.
Update 6: Added All Perfect Weapon Timers - All weapons and bows have perfect timers. - Magic also includes perfect timing.
Update 7: Added All Weapon Animations - All weapons have their animations and/or gfx. - Corresponding animations and/or gfx are in perfect order.
Update 8: Fixed NPC Health Bar Glitch - When an NPCs health bar lowers to 0, it doesnt show a hit. For example, if a NPC has 4 hp left, and the player hits a double hit, it would hit 4,0.
Update 9: Added CastleWars - Added waiting room, with 11 minute timer. - Game lasts 10 minutes.
Update 10: New Jail area
[b]Download Link:[/b] http://uppit.com/v/9ME0UCW6
Picture(s): [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2q87lok.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2a6mcft.jpg[/img]

item.title: Hax0rscape v1
item.dc:creator: @1337_pow3r 1337 pow3r
item.description:
@1337_pow3r wrote:

FEATURES OF HAXORSCAPE V1:
Update 1: Fixing Player Messaging Glitches

  • Actual player messaging wasnt even 10% working, brought it to perfect messaging.
  • Friends and Ignore lists work.
  • Doesnt display a world since theres only one.

Update 2: Improved Ranging Skill

  • Perfect arrow animations and projectiles working with an almost perfect delay.
  • Everytime an arrow is shot; an arrow is removed from the player.
  • If arrows arent equipped, player doesnt shoot.
  • Faces player/npc when shooting.
  • Almost all bows work except for 3 longbows.

Update 3: Magic Bow Special

  • Perfect arrow projectiles, perfect animation, great delay.
  • Shows two arrows being shot.
  • Double hitting.

Update 4: Crystal Bow

  • Perfect animations, gfx and projectiles.
  • Doesnt use arrows.

Update 5: Fixed Repeative Animations

  • No more animation looping.

Update 6: Added All Perfect Weapon Timers

  • All weapons and bows have perfect timers.
  • Magic also includes perfect timing.

Update 7: Added All Weapon Animations

  • All weapons have their animations and/or gfx.
  • Corresponding animations and/or gfx are in perfect order.

Update 8: Fixed NPC Health Bar Glitch

  • When an NPCs health bar lowers to 0, it doesnt show a hit. For example, if a NPC has 4 hp left, and the player hits a double hit, it would hit 4,0.

Update 9: Added CastleWars

  • Added waiting room, with 11 minute timer.
  • Game lasts 10 minutes.

Update 10:
New Jail area

Download Link:
http://uppit.com/v/9ME0UCW6
